lead_paragraph: Antonio Guterres took the reins of the United Nations on New Year's Day, promising to be a "bridge-builder" but facing an antagonistic incoming U.S. administration led by Donald Trump who thinks the world body's 193 member states do nothing except talk and have a good time.
snippet: Antonio Guterres took the reins of the United Nations on New Year's Day, promising to be a "bridge-builder" but facing an antagonistic incoming U.S. administration led by Donald Trump who thinks the world body's 193 member states do nothing except...

headline.main: New UN Chief Urges New Year's Resolution: 'Put Peace First'
headline.print_headline: New UN Chief Urges New Year's Resolution: 'Put Peace First'
